text: Richy arrive to the living room and is waiting to the router to be restarted...
Come on, come on go online, come on.
The router turn on his green light, now Richy is good to go.
I have to go back before the game ends.
Richy runs to his desktop, click on restart the connection, and... voila the game is on again.
Richy continue playing but he notice that someone was behind him...
His mom slap him in his face with the flip flops.
<Spanish> Se acab√≥ la virtrolita a comer, carajo!!
